title: 'Marigold Hotel' Director Had No Reservations About A Sequel
teaser: John Madden directed both "The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel" and the new sequel, "The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel." He joins us.
contentencoded:
“The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel” was a huge hit in 2012. The film, about a group of retirees at a hotel for the elderly in India, starred a number of British acting legends, including Judi Dench, Maggie Smith, and Bill Nighy.

Now there’s a follow up, “The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel.” Here & Now’s Robin Young speaks with John Madden, who directed both films.

[Youtube]

Guest

  • John Madden, director of “The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel” and “The Second Best Exotic Marigold Hotel.”
